item.title: Barclays Initiates Incyte With Overweight Rating, $90 Price Target, Retail Finds Reason To Cheer
item.description: Barclays sees "value-inflecting" data readouts for the pharmaceutical company in the second half of 2025 and 2026.

item.title: ‘Mind-Blowing Beat’: Reddit’s Q2 Surge Ignites Wall Street And Retail Optimism Alike
item.description: Truist lifted its price target to $225 from $160 while maintaining a ‘Buy’ rating, noting Reddit’s Q2 earnings beat was anchored by rising advertiser ...

item.title: Trump Directs Team To Fire BLS Commissioner Erika McEntarfer After Jobs Report Revises May, June Numbers Downward By 258,000
item.description: Earlier on Friday, the BLS released the jobs report for July, stating that only 73,000 nonfarm payrolls were added during the month.

item.title: Tesla Ordered To Pay $243M In Autopilot Crash Case: Report
item.description: The Autopilot crash in question occurred in 2019 and killed a young couple who were out stargazing.

item.title: NFL Sells RedZone And Other Media Assets To Disney For Stake In ESPN: Report
item.description: According to The Atlantic, sources said the official announcement is expected next week.
